x = int(input().split()[0])
n = int(input().split()[0])
p = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
p.sort()

if x <= p[0]:
    print(x-p[0])
elif x >= p[-1]:
    print(x-p[-1])
else:
    for i in range(1, n):
        if x <= p[i]:
            print(min(x-p[i-1], p[i]-x))
            break

x, y, z = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

print(x, y, z)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n = int(input())

for i in range(n):
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a+b)


x = int(input()) # 현재 위치
n = int(input()) # 보관함의 개수
p = list(map(int, input().split())) # 보관함의 위치

p.sort()

if x < p[0]:
    print(p[0] - x)
elif x > p[n-1]:
    print(x - p[n-1])
else:
    for i in range(1, n):
        if p[i-1] < x and x < p[i]:
            if abs(p[i-1] - x) < abs(p[i] - x):
                print(p[i-1] - x)
            else:
                print(p[i] - x)
            break

x = int(input())
n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

p.sort()

if x < p[0]:
    print(p[0] - x)
elif x > p[n-1]:
    print(x - p[n-1])
else:
    for i in range(1, n):
        if p[i-1] < x and x < p[i]:
            if abs(p[i-1] - x) < abs(p[i] - x):
                print(p[i-1] - x)
            else:
                print(p[i] - x)
            break
